body: I remember locking permissions being revoked from moderators, only allowing seniors staff to lock topics? Was this given back to the moderators? If so, why?
body_tagged: I remember locking permissions being revoked from moderators, only allowing seniors staff to lock topics? Was this given back to the moderators? If so, why?
title: Moderators can lock topics?

replies.body: Yea it was. I dunno why.
replies.body_tagged: Yea it was. I dunno why.

replies.body:
I think permissions were given back a long time ago..
I don't really know.

replies.body:
The permissions were given back when the update came back. 
It was a surprise to us as well, but I'm sure the Senior Moderators and Admins have plans to train us somehow. If not they are giving us a second chance :)
We have acknowledged our mistakes we did before and we will be doing the opposite of our mistakes.
We can always learn from others mistakes or our mistakes. This time we learnt from our own mistakes and will make sure to fix it :)
